content: the heart flower dish/wash cloth was designed in memory of my mother who loved flowers i used a heart as the flower to symbolize my love for her it looks great in any color combination making it a stylish and practical addition to your kitchen or bath essentials it would make a perfect mother s day gift it would also make a great gift for family and friends and it s sure to be a hot seller at your next market ***materials*** **➤yarn ** 100% cotton i used lily sugar n cream **➤yardage ** 80-100 yds **➤hooks ** 5 0 mm *contact the designer https //linktr ee/marshayarndoodles* this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own feel free to sell finished products made with this pattern please credit @marshayarndoodles as the pattern designer this pattern is property of @marshayarndoodles © 2024
